org.stringmatching.heuristic.wu_manber

Class WM_Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stringmatching.pattern.PatternModel
      • org.stringmatching.heuristic.wu_manber.WM_Pattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IPatternModel

    public final class WM_Pattern
extends PatternModel
implements java.io.Serializable
    Build the Pattern Model for the Wu Manber method. To be finished because it is only with the purpose to build the the hybrid method. Requires to be optimized (a lot).
    See Also:
